description: Specimen shows FIGO grade 2 endometrioid adenocarcinoma with focal clear cell features invading less than half of the myometrium, with no cervical or nodal involvement and suspicious lymphovascular invasion.
patient_notes: This report describes early-stage uterine cancer confined to the uterine lining and muscle wall, with no spread to lymph nodes or other tissues. A small focus of vessel involvement was noted, which increases the risk of recurrence. To reduce this risk, we recommend adjuvant vaginal brachytherapy, a targeted radiation treatment focused on the upper vagina.

verification.assessment: Staging is correctly identified as FIGO stage IA and pathologic stage pT1a pN0 pM0 based on less than half myometrial invasion and negative lymph nodes.
